bitmap. - MAX_NUM_SLOTS is 256 in this implementation (using one uint256) - Superfluid token storage usage:   - getAgreementStateSlot(bitmapStateSlotId) stores the bitmap of enabled data slots   - getAgreementStateSlot(dataStateSlotIDStart + stotId) stores the data of the slot","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"Slots Bitmap
